title: Apple touts next week’s ‘Peek Performance’ special event with AR easter egg
content:
Apple has officially announced its March event. Along with sharing the date, the company has continued its tradition of hiding a fun easter egg for iPhone and iPad users on the invite.

more…

The post Apple touts next week’s ‘Peek Performance’ special event with AR easter egg appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Along with sharing the Apple event date, the company has continued its tradition of hiding an easter egg for iPhone users on the invite.
